languages.text: "Прикуси язык, торговка ксеноересью, и не болтай о том, чего не знаешь!" {n}Клеменциа обрывает Джай жестко, будто саблей рассекая воздух словами. Затем обращается к вам, виновато склоняя голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Прикуси язык, торговка ксеноересью, и не болтай о том, чего не знаешь!" {n}Клеменциа обрывает Джай жестко, будто саблей рассекая воздух словами. Затем обращается к вам, виновато склоняя голову.{/n}

languages.text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прикуси язык, торговка ксеноересью, и не болтай о том, чего не знаешь!" {n}Клеменциа обрывает Джай жестко, будто саблей рассекая воздух словами. Затем обращается к вам, виновато склоняя голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xeno-heresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

"Hold your tongue, peddler of xeno-heresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

"Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

"Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

languages.text: « Tenez donc votre langue, bonimenteuse de blasphèmes, et évitez de parler de choses dont vous ne savez rien ! » {n}Ces paroles stoppent Jae net, puis Clémentia se tourne vers vous, honteuse, la tête basse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tenez donc votre langue, bonimenteuse de blasphèmes, et évitez de parler de choses dont vous ne savez rien ! » {n}Ces paroles stoppent Jae net, puis Clémentia se tourne vers vous, honteuse, la tête basse.{/n}

languages.text: “闭嘴，兜售异形玩意的家伙！别谈论你根本不懂的事情！”{n}克莱门缇雅的话像锋利的军刀一样打断了婕伊，随后她转向你，羞愧地低下了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴，兜售异形玩意的家伙！别谈论你根本不懂的事情！”{n}克莱门缇雅的话像锋利的军刀一样打断了婕伊，随后她转向你，羞愧地低下了头。{/n}

languages.text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, Kauffrau der Xeno-Ketzerei, und sprecht nicht von Dingen, von denen Ihr nichts versteht!" {n}Clementias Einwurf schneidet Jaes Worte ab wie der Hieb eines Säbels. Dann wendet Clementia sich zu dir, den Kopf beschämt gesenkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, Kauffrau der Xeno-Ketzerei, und sprecht nicht von Dingen, von denen Ihr nichts versteht!" {n}Clementias Einwurf schneidet Jaes Worte ab wie der Hieb eines Säbels. Dann wendet Clementia sich zu dir, den Kopf beschämt gesenkt.{/n}

languages.text: «Cierre el pico, vendedora de herejía xeno, ¡no hable de cosas de las que no tiene ni idea!». {n}Las palabras de Clementia cortan el discurso de Jae como el tajo de un sable. Luego Clementia se gira hacia ti, cabizbaja y avergonzada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cierre el pico, vendedora de herejía xeno, ¡no hable de cosas de las que no tiene ni idea!». {n}Las palabras de Clementia cortan el discurso de Jae como el tajo de un sable. Luego Clementia se gira hacia ti, cabizbaja y avergonzada.{/n}

languages.text: 「黙れ、異端異種族の商人め。知りもせぬことについて語るな！」{n}クレメンティアの言葉がジェイを切り裂くかのように響いた。その後、クレメンティアは恥ずかしげに頭を下げ、あなたへと向き直った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、異端異種族の商人め。知りもせぬことについて語るな！」{n}クレメンティアの言葉がジェイを切り裂くかのように響いた。その後、クレメンティアは恥ずかしげに頭を下げ、あなたへと向き直った。{/n}

languages.text: "Hele dur bakalım! Zeno kâfirlikleri ağzına öyle yuva yapmış ki bilgin olmayan konularda fikir belirtiyorsun!" {n}Clementia'nın sözleri, Jae'a hançer gibi saplanıyor. Ardından da Clementia, başını utançla eğerek sana dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, peddler of xenoheresy, and speak not of things you know nothing about!" {n}Clementia's words cut Jae off like the swing of a sabre. Then Clementia turns to you, her head lowered in shame.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hele dur bakalım! Zeno kâfirlikleri ağzına öyle yuva yapmış ki, hiç bilgin olmayan konularda fikrin çok!" {n}Clementia'nın sözleri, Jae'a hançer gibi saplanıyor. Ardından da Clementia başını utançla eğerek sana dönüyor.{/n}
